archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Data Governance Management
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Data Governance Management supervise and control the conformance/compliance to the DG strategy and policies

properties.value: Data Governance Management supervise and control the conformance/compliance to the DG strategy and policies. This is done by monitoring and guidance, and by initiating DG Maturity Assessments, DG Auditing and DG Improvements if needed
